workstreams.name: Trust Center & Content
workstreams.description: Build the Trust Center pages that establish credibility by mapping every computation to IRS sources, showcasing validated scenarios, and honestly disclosing limitations.

tasks.title: Create Trust Center hub page
tasks.description: Build docs/trust/index.html with navigation cards linking to IRS sources, validated scenarios, and known limitations sub-pages.

tasks.title: Build IRS sources reference table
tasks.description: Create docs/trust/irs-sources.html mapping every computation node in src/rules/2025/*.ts to its authoritative IRS publication with direct links.

tasks.title: Write validated tax scenarios
tasks.description: Create docs/trust/scenarios.html with 10 detailed scenario walkthroughs showing inputs, expected outputs, computed outputs, and delta.

tasks.title: Write known limitations page
tasks.description: Create docs/trust/limitations.html with honest disclosure of unsupported forms, scenarios, and constraints.

tasks.title: Create privacy policy page
tasks.description: Create docs/privacy.html stating no data collection, client-side-only computation, and IRS non-affiliation disclaimer.

acceptanceCriteria: All 5 HTML files render correctly in browser with no console errors
Every src/rules/2025/*.ts file has at least one IRS citation in the sources table
All 10 scenarios have specific dollar amounts and pass/fail status
Limitations page covers all unsupported items: Schedule C, F, K-1, foreign income, multi-state, e-filing, prior-year, business returns
All pages use consistent Tailwind CDN styling matching docs/index.html design language
All pages include <title>, <meta description>, and Open Graph tags
Internal navigation links work between all Trust Center pages
Privacy page includes IRS non-affiliation disclaimer

workstreams.name: Interactive Trace Demo
workstreams.description: Build a self-contained interactive demo page that lets visitors explore a pre-computed trace tree, showcasing OpenTax's unique explainability feature.

tasks.title: Extract sample trace data
tasks.description: Generate a representative trace tree JSON for a sample return (Single filer, $85K W-2, $1,200 interest, standard deduction) based on the engine's node structure.

tasks.title: Build trace visualization page
tasks.description: Create docs/demo/index.html with an interactive tree view using vanilla JS. Nodes expand/collapse on click, colored by source type.

tasks.title: Add IRS citation display
tasks.description: Show IRS publication citations and confidence scores on each trace node when expanded.

tasks.title: Add CTAs and mobile responsiveness
tasks.description: Add conversion CTAs (Run with your data, View source, Add to AI agent) and ensure vertical tree layout on mobile screens.

acceptanceCriteria: Demo loads with pre-computed trace data from trace-data.json (no server required)
User can expand/collapse any trace node by clicking
Expanding to depth 3+ shows leaf document/user-entry sources
Each node displays: label, formatted currency amount, source type badge, IRS citation
Nodes are color-coded: green (document), blue (computed), gray (user-entry)
Trace tree accurately mirrors computation path in src/rules/engine.ts
Page is mobile-responsive with vertical tree layout on screens < 640px
Page includes CTAs linking to GitHub, standalone quickstart, and plugin docs
Total page size (HTML + JSON + inline CSS/JS) is under 200KB

workstreams.name: Developer Docs & Plugin Guide
workstreams.description: Create developer-facing documentation pages covering standalone setup and OpenClaw plugin integration with code examples and architecture diagrams.

tasks.title: Create developer docs hub
tasks.description: Build docs/docs/index.html with cards linking to standalone quickstart and OpenClaw plugin guides.

tasks.title: Write standalone quickstart
tasks.description: Create docs/docs/standalone.html with prerequisites, git clone, npm install, npm run dev flow, copy-to-clipboard buttons, and environment variable reference.

tasks.title: Write OpenClaw plugin guide
tasks.description: Create docs/docs/openclaw-plugin.html covering plugin installation, 16 tool definitions, TaxService API, SSE events, dashboard, and example agent conversation.

tasks.title: Add architecture diagrams
tasks.description: Include inline SVG or ASCII diagrams showing standalone topology (browser ↔ local server ↔ SQLite) and plugin topology (agent ↔ plugin HTTP API ↔ TaxService).

acceptanceCriteria: All 3 HTML files render correctly in browser with no console errors
Standalone guide has copy-to-clipboard buttons for git clone, npm install, and npm run dev commands
Plugin guide documents all 16 agent tools listed in openclaw-plugin/
Plugin guide includes a TaxService API usage code example
Architecture diagram clearly distinguishes standalone vs. plugin data flow
All pages use consistent Tailwind CDN styling matching docs/index.html
All pages include <title>, <meta description>, and Open Graph tags
Code blocks use syntax-highlighted monospace styling matching landing page terminal block

workstreams.name: SEO, Analytics & Landing Page Polish
workstreams.description: Optimize the landing page for search engines and conversions, add analytics tracking, create SEO infrastructure files, and wire up event tracking across all pages.

tasks.title: Update landing page SEO tags
tasks.description: Fix <title>, add <meta description> (150-160 chars), add canonical URL, uncomment and set og:image tag in docs/index.html.

tasks.title: Add Demo and Trust Center CTAs
tasks.description: Add 'Try the Demo' button to hero section, add Trust Center and Docs links to navigation bar in docs/index.html.

tasks.title: Generate Open Graph image
tasks.description: Create docs/og-image.png (1200×630) social sharing card with OpenTax branding, tagline, and key value props.

tasks.title: Create SEO infrastructure files
tasks.description: Create docs/sitemap.xml listing all pages with lastmod dates, and docs/robots.txt with allow-all policy and sitemap reference.

tasks.title: Add Plausible analytics
tasks.description: Add Plausible script tag to docs/index.html <head>. Wire up custom events for CTA clicks, GitHub clicks, and scroll depth milestones.

tasks.title: Cross-browser and Lighthouse audit
tasks.description: Test landing page in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and mobile Safari. Run Lighthouse audit targeting 95+ Performance, 100 Accessibility, 100 SEO.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page <title> is 'OpenTax — Free Open-Source Tax Preparation Software'
<meta description> is 150-160 characters containing target keywords
og:image points to valid docs/og-image.png at 1200×630 dimensions
Hero section has 'Try the Demo' button alongside existing CTAs
Navigation bar includes links to: Features, Trust Center, Demo, Docs, GitHub
docs/sitemap.xml lists all pages with correct absolute URLs and lastmod dates
docs/robots.txt allows all crawlers and references sitemap.xml
Plausible analytics snippet is present in <head>
Custom events fire on CTA clicks (verifiable via browser console)
Lighthouse scores: Performance >= 95, Accessibility = 100, SEO = 100
Landing page loads in under 2 seconds on simulated 3G

integrationPlan.description: After all 4 tracks complete independently, a final integration pass merges branches and verifies cross-page navigation.
postMergeChecks: All internal links resolve (no 404s across pages)
Navigation bar on all pages links to all major sections
Plausible snippet is present on every page
Full site Lighthouse audit passes thresholds
og:image renders correctly in Twitter/Facebook card validators

fileOwnership.description: Every file is owned by exactly one track. No overlapping file modifications between concurrent tracks.
